statements: DELETE FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE id = 1 AND influencer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_comments > 100 AND engagement_score < 50;
DELETE FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe' AND engagement_rate > 5.0;
DELETE FROM influencers WHERE name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE id = 1 AND likes > 100
DELETE FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND post_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'like' AND engagement_date < '2022-01-01';
